text: Balistoides is a genus of Indo-Pacific triggerfish. == Species == * Balistoides conspicillum Bloch & J. G. Schneider, 1801 (Clown triggerfish) * Balistoides viridescens Bloch & J. G. Schneider, 1801 (Titan triggerfish) == References == # Matsuura, Keiichi (2014). "Taxonomy and systematics of tetraodontiform fishes: a review focusing primarily on progress in the period from 1980 to 2014". Ichthyological Research. # "Balistoides". Encyclopedia of Life. Category:Tetraodontiformes Category:Ray-finned fish
title: Balistoides
